HOME.loading: Hang on while the app loads...

ABOUT.b1: Zip Captions is a tool that will generate speech-to-text results for a given input device such as your machine's microphone.
ABOUT.b2: Converting audio to text in real-time can make life more accessible. We aim to do this for everyone for free, as simply as possible.
ABOUT.b3: We are a pair of educators and coders who believe that technology should be accessible, and that accessibility does not exist behind a paywall.
ABOUT.b4: The core functionality will always be free. We aim to make as much of the tool as free as possible. However, in some cases, we may ask for money to help offset project costs.
ABOUT.b5: The core functionality will always be free. We aim to make as much of the tool as free as possible. However, in some cases, we may ask for money to help offset project costs.

MODAL.name: Cookies
MODAL.title: This website uses cookies
MODAL.p1: We use cookies to provide website functionality. We only store strictly necessary cookies, required to allow the functionality of this applications (e.g. customized settings, etc).
MODAL.p2: We do not track or store any non-functional cookies on your device.
MODAL.p3: View our cookie policy for more detail

POLICY.title: Cookie Policy
POLICY.p1: Please read this cookie policy ("cookie policy", "policy") carefully before using this website ("website", "service") operated by ZipCaptions ("us", "we", "our").
POLICY.p2: Cookies are simple text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device by a website's server. Each cookie is unique to your web browser. It will contain some anonymous information such as a unique identifier, website's domain name, and some digits and numbers.
POLICY.h3: What types of cookies do we use?
POLICY.p3: Necessary cookies allow us to offer you the best possible experience when accessing and navigating through our website and using its features. For example, these cookies let us recognize that you have created an account and have logged into that account.
POLICY.p4: Functionality cookies let us operate the site in accordance with the choices you make. For example, we will remember how you customized the site during future visits.
POLICY.p5: These cookies enable us and third-party services to collect aggregated data for statistical purposes on how our visitors use the website. These cookies do not contain personal information such as names and email addresses and are used to help us improve your user experience of the website.These cookies enable us and third-party services to collect aggregated data for statistical purposes on how our visitors use the website. These cookies do not contain personal information such as names and email addresses and are used to help us improve your user experience of the website.
POLICY.p6_1: If you want to restrict or block the cookies that are set by our website, you can do so through your browser setting. Alternatively, you can visit
POLICY.p6_2: , which contains comprehensive information on how to do this on a wide variety of browsers and devices. You will find general information about cookies and details on how to delete cookies from your device.

PRIVACY.title: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.1.1: We are committed to safeguarding the privacy of our website visitors; in this policy we explain how we will treat your personal information.
PRIVACY.1.2: We will ask you to consent to our use of cookies in accordance with the terms of this policy when you first visit our website. / By using our website and agreeing to this policy, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with the terms of this policy.
PRIVACY.2.1: This document was created using a template from SEQ Legal (http://www.seqlegal.com).
PRIVACY.3.1: We may collect, store and use the following kinds of personal information:
PRIVACY.3.1a: information about your computer and about your visits to and use of this website (including your IP address, geographical location, browser type and version, operating system, referral source, length of visit, page views and website navigation paths);
PRIVACY.3.1b: information that you provide to us when registering with our website (including your email address);
PRIVACY.3.1c: information that you provide when completing your profile on our website (including your name, profile pictures, gender, date of birth, relationship status, interests and hobbies, educational details and employment details);
PRIVACY.3.1d: information that you provide to us for the purpose of subscribing to our email notifications and/or newsletters (including your name and email address);
PRIVACY.3.1e: information that you provide to us when using the services on our website, or that is generated in the course of the use of those services (including the timing, frequency and pattern of service use);
PRIVACY.3.1f: information relating to any purchases you make of our goods / services / goods and/or services or any other transactions that you enter into through our website (including your name, address, telephone number, email address and card details);
PRIVACY.3.1g: information that you post to our website for publication on the internet (including your user name, your profile pictures and the content of your posts);
PRIVACY.3.1h: information contained in or relating to any communication that you send to us or send through our website (including the communication content and metadata associated with the communication);
PRIVACY.3.1i: any other personal information that you choose to send to us;
PRIVACY.3.2: Before you disclose to us the personal information of another person, you must obtain that person's consent to both the disclosure and the processing of that personal information in accordance with this policy.
PRIVACY.4.1: Personal information submitted to us through our website will be used for the purposes specified in this policy or on the relevant pages of the website.
PRIVACY.4.2: We may use your personal information to:
PRIVACY.4.2c: enable your use of the services available on our website;
PRIVACY.4.2d: send you goods purchased through our website;
PRIVACY.4.2e: supply to you services purchased through our website;
PRIVACY.4.2f: send statements, invoices and payment reminders to you, and collect payments from you;
PRIVACY.4.2h: send you email notifications that you have specifically requested;
PRIVACY.4.2i: send you our email newsletter, if you have requested it (you can inform us at any time if you no longer require the newsletter);
PRIVACY.4.2j: send you marketing communications relating to our business or the businesses of carefully-selected third parties which we think may be of interest to you, by post or, where you have specifically agreed to this, by email or similar technology (you can inform us at any time if you no longer require marketing communications);
PRIVACY.4.2k: provide third parties with statistical information about our users (but those third parties will not be able to identify any individual user from that information);
PRIVACY.4.2l: deal with enquiries and complaints made by or about you relating to our website;
PRIVACY.4.2m: keep our website secure and prevent fraud;
PRIVACY.4.2n: verify compliance with the terms and conditions governing the use of our website (including monitoring private messages sent through our website private messaging service);
PRIVACY.4.3: If you submit personal information for publication on our website, we will publish and otherwise use that information in accordance with the licence you grant to us.
PRIVACY.4.4: Your privacy settings can be used to limit the publication of your information on our website, and can be adjusted using privacy controls on the website.
PRIVACY.4.5: We will not, without your express consent, supply your personal information to any third party for the purpose of their or any other third party's direct marketing.
PRIVACY.4.6: All our website financial transactions are handled through our payment services provider, PSP name. You can review the provider's privacy policy at URL. We will share information with our payment services provider only to the extent necessary for the purposes of processing payments you make via our website, refunding such payments and dealing with complaints and queries relating to such payments and refunds.
PRIVACY.5.1: We may disclose your personal information to any of our employees, officers, insurers, professional advisers, agents, suppliers or subcontractors insofar as reasonably necessary for the purposes set out in this policy.
PRIVACY.5.2: We may disclose your personal information to any member of our group of companies (this means our subsidiaries, our ultimate holding company and all its subsidiaries) insofar as reasonably necessary for the purposes set out in this policy.
PRIVACY.5.3: We may disclose your personal information:
PRIVACY.5.3a: to the extent that we are required to do so by law;
PRIVACY.5.3b: in connection with any ongoing or prospective legal proceedings;
PRIVACY.5.3c: in order to establish, exercise or defend our legal rights (including providing information to others for the purposes of fraud prevention and reducing credit risk);
PRIVACY.5.3d: to the purchaser (or prospective purchaser) of any business or asset that we are (or are contemplating) selling; and
PRIVACY.5.3e: to any person who we reasonably believe may apply to a court or other competent authority for disclosure of that personal information where, in our reasonable opinion, such court or authority would be reasonably likely to order disclosure of that personal information.
PRIVACY.5.4: Except as provided in this policy, we will not provide your personal information to third parties.
PRIVACY.6.1: Information that we collect may be stored and processed in and transferred between any of the countries in which we operate in order to enable us to use the information in accordance with this policy.
PRIVACY.6.2: Information that we collect may be transferred to the following countries which do not have data protection laws equivalent to those in force in the European Economic Area: the United States of America, Canada.
PRIVACY.6.3: Personal information that you publish on our website or submit for publication on our website may be available, via the internet, around the world. We cannot prevent the use or misuse of such information by others.
PRIVACY.6.4: You expressly agree to the transfers of personal information described in this Section 6.
PRIVACY.7.1: This Section 7 sets out our data retention policies and procedure, which are designed to help ensure that we comply with our legal obligations in relation to the retention and deletion of personal information.
PRIVACY.7.2: Personal information that we process for any purpose or purposes shall not be kept for longer than is necessary for that purpose or those purposes.
PRIVACY.7.3: Without prejudice to Section 7.2, we will usually delete personal data falling within the categories set out below at the date/time set out below:
PRIVACY.7.3a: Personally Identifiable Information will be deleted if it is not accessed for a period of 2 years.
PRIVACY.7.4: Notwithstanding the other provisions of this Section 7, we will retain documents (including electronic documents) containing personal data:
PRIVACY.7.4a: to the extent that we are required to do so by law;
PRIVACY.7.4b: if we believe that the documents may be relevant to any ongoing or prospective legal proceedings; and
PRIVACY.7.4c: in order to establish, exercise or defend our legal rights (including providing information to others for the purposes of fraud prevention and reducing credit risk).
PRIVACY.8.1: We will take reasonable technical and organisational precautions to prevent the loss, misuse or alteration of your personal information.
PRIVACY.8.2: We will store all the personal information you provide on our secure (password- and firewall-protected) servers.
PRIVACY.8.3: All electronic financial transactions entered into through our website will be protected by encryption technology.
PRIVACY.8.4: You acknowledge that the transmission of information over the internet is inherently insecure, and we cannot guarantee the security of data sent over the internet.
PRIVACY.8.5: You are responsible for keeping the password you use for accessing our website confidential; we will not ask you for your password (except when you log in to our website).
PRIVACY.9.1: We may update this policy from time to time by publishing a new version on our website.
PRIVACY.9.2: You should check this page occasionally to ensure you are happy with any changes to this policy.
PRIVACY.9.3: We may notify you of changes to this policy by email or through the private messaging system on our website.
PRIVACY.10.1: You may instruct us to provide you with any personal information we hold about you; provision of such information will be subject to:
PRIVACY.10.1a: the payment of a fee (currently fixed at CAD $10); and
PRIVACY.10.1b: the supply of appropriate evidence of your identity (for this purpose, we will usually accept a photocopy of your passport certified by a solicitor or bank plus an original copy of a utility bill showing your current address).
PRIVACY.10.2: We may withhold personal information that you request to the extent permitted by law.
PRIVACY.10.3: Your personal information will never be used for marketing purposes.
PRIVACY.11.1: Our website includes hyperlinks to, and details of, third party websites.
PRIVACY.11.2: We have no control over, and are not responsible for, the privacy policies and practices of third parties.
PRIVACY.12.1: Please let us know if the personal information that we hold about you needs to be corrected or updated.
PRIVACY.13.1: This website is owned and operated by Zip Captions, an unregistered, undocumented organization composed of people who believe in accessibility

WELCOME.p2: Zip Captions provides an easy to use live captions experience which lives right inside your browser. We don't capture, store, or share any of your data, there are no hidden fees, and no agreements to sign.
WELCOME.p3: Click the microphone at the top to get started.
WELCOME.warning: For optimal results, we recommend using Chrome or Safari on Desktop.

UI.p1: Each segment of previously-recognized text will appear like this.
UI.p3: With each new result appearing underneath the previous.
UI.cookieWarning: You must accept cookies before you can save settings

SHARING.staticRoomP1: Claim your own static broadcast ID, so you can use the same address for every stream.
SHARING.staticRoomP2: You can also set the stream to public, so anyone can view without a join code.
SHARING.loginRequired: You must log in before you can save custom broadcast settings.

SYNC.subheader: Synchronize the appearance of the application
SYNC.noneSaved: You have not yet saved appearance settings
SYNC.inSync: Your appearance settings are in sync
SYNC.applyGlobally: Use these settings everywhere I log in
SYNC.loginRequired: You must log in before you can save custom UI settings

STREAM.broadcastExplanantion: Create a session where users can connect and view closed-captions by joining on their own device using the session ID and join code.
STREAM.joinSessionExplanation: View closed captions from an existing broadcast
STREAM.joinCodeRequired: Please enter the correct join code to view the session
STREAM.noSessionForRoom: It looks like there is no session being hosted for this ID.
STREAM.hostOffline: It looks like the session host is not currently connected.
STREAM.broadcastEnded: It looks like this broadcast ended
STREAM.permissionRequired: You must accept the risks of connecting to peers before you can broadcast or view.
STREAM.sessionIdCopied: Copied session ID to your clipboard
STREAM.joinCodeCopied: Copied join code to your clipboard
STREAM.connectionPendingHint: Hang on while we connect to the signaling server so you can connect to other devices...
STREAM.broadcastDetected: It looks like you are hosting a broadcast in another session! We have automatically filled the room ID for you.
STREAM.authDescription: Require viewers to enter join code

ROOMCARD.changeWarning: The broadcast ID cannot be changed after saving.

MODAL.confirmEndBroadcast: This will end the current broadcast and disconnect all peers.
MODAL.confirmLeaveSession: Are you sure you want to disconnect from this session? You will need to re-enter the ID and join code to reconnect.
MODAL.accessP1: Streaming or viewing a stream can potentially expose private information about your device to others on the internet.
MODAL.accessP2: ZipCaptions anonymizes your information as much as possible, but certain immutable details (e.g. IP address) can be exposed when connecting to peers online.
MODAL.accessP3: Would you like to enable this feature?
MODAL.unsavedChangesParagraph: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to discard them?
MODAL.syncSettingsP1: You have opted to sync your appearance settings when signed in. Would you like to save these changes everywhere?
MODAL.syncSettingsP2: If you choose not to save, your stored settings will be applied the next time you sign in.

LABELS.wakelockOn: Prevent the screen from sleeping while captions are active
LABELS.wakelockOff: Zip Captions will respect your system settings for sleep.
LABELS.rememberSetting: Remember my response on this device.

HINTS.streamConnected: Text will appear once we hear something...
HINTS.viewStream: Visit ZipCaptions.app and use the session ID and join code to view captions on your own device.
HINTS.offlineWarning: You appear to be offline - ZipCaptions requires a connection to the internet to operate.
HINTS.advancedWarning: Do not change unless you are confident you know what you are doing

ERRORS.missingApi: Sorry, your browser has not yet implemented the APIs necessary for ZipCaptions to run. We recommend Chrome or Safari on desktop.
ERRORS.serviceUnavailable: It looks like the service is not yet available on this platform. We recommend Chrome or Safari
ERRORS.liveTextMissing: It appears that live streaming results are not yet supported on your platform.
ERRORS.mobileBroadcast: Broadcasting is not available from a mobile device.
ERRORS.unsupportedBrowserBroadcast: Broadcasting is not supported from this browser.

RECOGNITION.no-speech: Speech recognition error: No speech was detected.
RECOGNITION.aborted: Speech recognition error: Speech input was aborted in some manner.
RECOGNITION.audio-capture: Speech recognition error: Audio capture failure.
RECOGNITION.network: Speech recognition error: Network communication required for completing the recognition failed.
RECOGNITION.not-allowed: Speech recognition error: The user agent disallowed any speech input from occurring for reasons of security, privacy or user preference.
RECOGNITION.service-not-allowed: Speech recognition error: The user agent disallowed the requested speech recognition service, either because the user agent doesn't support it or because of reasons of security, privacy or user preference.
RECOGNITION.bad-grammar: Speech recognition error: There was an error in the speech recognition grammar or semantic tags, or the chosen grammar format or semantic tag format was unsupported.
RECOGNITION.language-not-supported: Speech recognition error: The user agent does not support the language specified in the value of lang attribute of the SpeechRecognition object.

SW_VERSION.VERSION_READY: You are viewing an older version of the app. Refresh to see the latest.

CONNECTIONS.obsStreamInactive: Waiting for OBS stream to begin
CONNECTIONS.connectionEstablished: Connected - you may begin caption session

AUTH.title: Login to Zip Captions
AUTH.blurb: Use your account to enable features that work across all sessions.

PROFILE.title: Welcome
PROFILE.blurb: Here's what we know about you:
PROFILE.name: Name
PROFILE.deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted, and your personal information has been purged from our database.
PROFILE.deleteWarnP1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
PROFILE.deleteWarnP3: If you change your mind, you can always create your account again by signing in with a provider.
PROFILE.confirmLabel: Confirm account deletion by typing your registered email address below
PROFILE.emailDeleteError: The email address must match your registered email
PROFILE.reasonLabel: Optionally let us know why you've decided to delete your account

DELETE_REASONS.alternative: I've found a captioning app that works better for me than Zip Captions
DELETE_REASONS.quality: Zip Captions isn't generating the captions I need, or the quality is poor
DELETE_REASONS.privacy: I'm worried about how Zip Captions handles my data
DELETE_REASONS.usage: I don't need to use captioning as much anymore
DELETE_REASONS.bugs: Zip Captions is unreliable, or too complicated to figure out
